column1: Boadilla del Monte (Spanish pronunciation: [boaˈðiʎa ðel ˈmonte]) is a town and municipality in central Spain. It is located in the west of the Community of Madrid. It had a population of 51,463 in 2017.
The registered office of Santander Bank is based there.
